From: Joe Nasr <joe.nasr@nascofrance.com>
To: 'Chloé Benyahia' <c.benyahia@christofle.com>; Pauline Battini <p.battini@christofle.com>; Marion Bellec <m.bellec@christofle.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>

Subject: RENEWAL MOTOR FLEET POLICY  AXA FRANCE 10319352404-  EXPIRY DATE 01/01/2025
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Mrs. Benyahia,

 

As informed in my previous email concerning the renewal of the Master policy with Axa, It has been reported on various channels, the French government has decided to increase the taxes on natural disasters from 6% to 9% .

This government decision is applied by all insurers with effect from 01/01/2025.

 

In addition, we have added to the fleet on 17/01/2024 a new equipment entry I . e:  Manitou forklift with an additional premium of 362.71€  ( see page 4 of the Motor fleet)

metadata.doc_id: C1E6OGN - renewal motor fleet policy axa france 10319352404- expiry date 01 01 2025\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\C1E6OGN - renewal motor fleet policy axa france 10319352404- expiry date 01 01 2025\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
This government decision is applied by all insurers with effect from 01/01/2025.

 

In addition, we have added to the fleet on 17/01/2024 a new equipment entry I . e:  Manitou forklift with an additional premium of 362.71€  ( see page 4 of the Motor fleet) 

Also, due to the inflation (over 20%), the cost of raw materials, energy, labor, repairs, auto spare parts have also increased

This year the insurance market is very difficult and the room for maneuver is very limited due to the significant losses suffered by the companies.  Also I has been reported on various Chanels. 

Finally, we have added to the fleet on 17/01/2024 a new equipment entry I . e:  Manitou  forklift with an additional premium of 362.71€  ( see page 4 of the Motor fleet) 

 

 



 

I remain at your disposal for any info needed and look forward to hearing back from you,

All the best. 

 

Joe Nasr

 



 

De : Chloé Benyahia <c.benyahia@christofle.com> 
Envoyé : vendredi 3 janvier 2025 17:53
À : Joe Nasr <joe.nasr@nascofrance.com>; Pauline Battini <p.battini@christofle.com>; Marion Bellec <m.bellec@christofle.com>; 'Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com' <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>

Ce message provient d'un expéditeur externe - soyez prudent, en particulier avec les liens et les pièces jointes. 
This message is from an external sender - be cautious, particularly with links and attachments 

Dear Mrs. Battini and Dear All,

 

All our best wishes for this new year.

 

You will find above the following documents :

 

*	The state of the fleet as of 01/01/2025 + the input/output of vehicles/ Equipment  

 

*	The 9 insurance certificates 

 

*	Period from 01/01/2025 to 01/01/2026 , premium due 8 708.16 € as follows: 

* Renewal 8 345.45 €

*Addition the amount of 362.71€ new entry of the equipment 

 

 

Please, review all the conditions of this state, check the input/ output, and inform us of any amendment to be done, so that we can advise Axa France and avoid a non-guarantee for a vehicle or Equipment. 

 

I remain at your disposal for any information needed and look forward to hearing back from you, 

 

All the best 

 

 

 

Joe Nasr

Head of General Insurance

 



We do everything we can to make your life easier and find solutions  

 

Nasco France

171 rue de Buzenval, 92380 Garches

T +33 1 47 95 97 12   F +33 1 47 95 24 56

E joe.nasr@nascofrance.com <mailto:joe.nasr@nascofrance.com> 

A member of the Nasco Insurance Group

Vos  emails adressés en dehors de la journée de travail n’appellent pas à être lus dans l’immédiat

 

This quote is subject to sanctions screening and the clearance by Nasco that there are no sanctions against any party that is covered under this risk and any party related thereto that has an interest in such risk*.

This sanction disclaimer applies not only if a party is itself sanctioned but also in respect of the inability to pay for any direct or indirect sanction.

Well noted but we find this increase really significant (above the +3% dans +362,71€ calculation). 

As a result, could you please put in competition other insurers for next year.

Ce message provient d'un expéditeur externe - soyez prudent, en particulier avec les liens et les pièces jointes. 
This message is from an external sender - be cautious, particularly with links and attachments 

Dear Mrs. Battini and Dear All,

 

All our best wishes for this new year.

 

You will find above the following documents :

 

*	The state of the fleet as of 01/01/2025 + the input/output of vehicles/ Equipment  

 

*	The 9 insurance certificates 

 

*	Period from 01/01/2025 to 01/01/2026 , premium due 8 708.16 € as follows: 

* Renewal 8 345.45 €

*Addition the amount of 362.71€ new entry of the equipment 

 

 

Please, review all the conditions of this state, check the input/ output, and inform us of any amendment to be done, so that we can advise Axa France and avoid a non-guarantee for a vehicle or Equipment. 

 

I remain at your disposal for any information needed and look forward to hearing back from you, 

 

All the best 

 

 

 

Joe Nasr

Head of General Insurance

 



We do everything we can to make your life easier and find solutions  

 

Nasco France

171 rue de Buzenval, 92380 Garches

T +33 1 47 95 97 12   F +33 1 47 95 24 56

E joe.nasr@nascofrance.com <mailto:joe.nasr@nascofrance.com> 

A member of the Nasco Insurance Group

Vos  emails adressés en dehors de la journée de travail n’appellent pas à être lus dans l’immédiat

 

This quote is subject to sanctions screening and the clearance by Nasco that there are no sanctions against any party that is covered under this risk and any party related thereto that has an interest in such risk*.

This sanction disclaimer applies not only if a party is itself sanctioned but also in respect of the inability to pay for any direct or indirect sanction.

Objet : RENEWAL MOTOR FLEET POLICY AXA FRANCE 10319352404- EXPIRY DATE 01/01/2025 

 

Dear Mrs. Benyahia,

 

As informed in my previous email concerning the renewal of the Master policy with Axa, It has been reported on various channels, the French government has decided to increase the taxes on natural disasters from 6% to 9% .

This government decision is applied by all insurers with effect from 01/01/2025.

metadata.doc_id: C1E6OGN - renewal motor fleet policy axa france 10319352404- expiry date 01 01 2025\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\C1E6OGN - renewal motor fleet policy axa france 10319352404- expiry date 01 01 2025\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
As informed in my previous email concerning the renewal of the Master policy with Axa, It has been reported on various channels, the French government has decided to increase the taxes on natural disasters from 6% to 9% .

This government decision is applied by all insurers with effect from 01/01/2025.

 

In addition, we have added to the fleet on 17/01/2024 a new equipment entry I . e:  Manitou forklift with an additional premium of 362.71€  ( see page 4 of the Motor fleet) 

Also, due to the inflation (over 20%), the cost of raw materials, energy, labor, repairs, auto spare parts have also increased

This year the insurance market is very difficult and the room for maneuver is very limited due to the significant losses suffered by the companies.  Also I has been reported on various Chanels. 

Finally, we have added to the fleet on 17/01/2024 a new equipment entry I . e:  Manitou  forklift with an additional premium of 362.71€  ( see page 4 of the Motor fleet) 

 

 



 

I remain at your disposal for any info needed and look forward to hearing back from you,

All the best. 

 

Joe Nasr
